resources.string: With Bluetooth disabled, eRouška cannot create a list of nearby phones.\n\nEnable it by pressing \"Enable Bluetooth\".
Application is running in the background and monitoring the surroundings. Please do not force stop the application. Keep Bluetooth enabled and use your phone as usual.
We will warn you in case you encountered someone with COVID-19 infection and show you all important information.
Last data update took place on %1$s and you didn\'t encounter anyone infected.

Application is now paused and is not collecting any data about other eRou\u0161ka applications in your vicinity.\n\nEnable data collection and keep yourself and others safe. Don\'t forget to do that especially when leaving your home.
We value your privacy. Sharing data is always under your control.
eRouška doesn\'t have any personal information about you and collects only anonymous data about other eRouška applications in your vicinity.
More information about protection of personal information and other terms of application usage can be found at terms of use.
Check yout internet connection and try again to activate your application. If problems persist, contact us at info@erouska.cz
eRouška needs to have notifications enabled to show you that you encountered someone with COVID-19
These notifications will let you know that you have been near a user with eRouška application who tested positive for COVID-19.
The app can only work correctly if it collects and shares random identification numbers which change automatically. We cannot identify an eRouška user based on these identification numbers.
You don\'t have to worry: the application does not track your location nor does it save it.

Starting with version 2.0, the eRouška application is developed by the Ministry of Health in collaboration with the National agency for communication and information technologies (NAKIT). Earlier versions of eRouška application were developed by a team of volunteers from the COVID19CZ community. Most of original eRouška developers continue to work on newer versions in the NAKIT team.
More information about protection of personal information and other terms of application usage can be found at terms of use.
The permission to access location needs to be granted to make the application work properly.
You can find more information about why that is in Help.

The application will monitor your surroundings continuously and record identification numbers of phones of users with the eRouška application you encounter.

If any of them test positive for COVID-19, the app will notify you that there was a risky contact.

If you test positive, the app will notify all application users that you encountered.
Thanks to eRou\u0161ka you will keep yourself and others safe

Hi, I\'m using eRouška application. Install it too and together we can help stop the spread of COVID-19. The application collects anonymous data about nearby phones so that the public health officers can find potentially positive people more easily. The more we are, the better it works. Application can be found at %s.
Your device seems to be offline.
In case of positive COVID-19 test you will be contacted by a public health officer. You will receive an SMS message with the verification code for sending data.
Request a new SMS message with a verification code from the public health officer.
Check your internet connection and try again.
Thank you for fighting against the spread of COVID-19.
Please cooperate with public health officers on finding everyone that you were in contact with.
Follow instructions of public health officers and medical workers.
It\'s been some time since your eRouška updated its data about being in contact with infected users. Connect to the internet.
You\'ve recently been in contact with someone who tested positive for COVID-19. Watch your health status closely. Find more info in the app.
eRouška can\'t communicate with other eRouška applications in your vicinity.\n\nEnable COVID-19 exposure notifications using \"Enable\" button.
We are preparing eRouška to be able to communicate with other similar applications around the world. That\'s why we made a few changes which we will now introduce.
If you encounter anyone with confirmed COVID-19 infection, eRouška will notify you and advise how to proceed.
We won\'t require phone numbers anymore

We are cancelling phone number registration because it won\'t be necessary to communicate with public health office anymore. eRouška will recommend you the next steps in case you encountered an infected person.
With these changes, terms of use were changed, too. The main change is that we no longer register phone numbers of eRouška users and they won\'t be needed for registration.
Latest version of Google Play Services is needed to activate notifications about encountering someone with confirmed COVID-19 infection.
eRouška needs to have notifications enabled to show you that you encountered someone with COVID-19
These notifications will let you know that you have been near a user with eRouška application who tested positive for COVID-19.
The app can only work correctly if it collects and shares random identification numbers which change automatically. We cannot identify an eRouška user based on these identification numbers.
Even when we don\'t use location data, turn them on for correct Bluetooth function using "Enable Location services" button.
Turn on Bluetooth and Location services
Without enabled Bluetooth and Location services eRouška can\t create list of other eRouška applications in your vicinity.
Even when we don\'t use location data, turn on both functions for correct Bluetooth function using "Enable BT and Location services" button.
